NAMES.subject: Subject
NAMES.documentPolicy: I hereby agree for processing my personal data, included in my job offer, for the purpose of recruitment (as defined in the Act of August 29, 1997 on the Protection of Personal Data (Journal of Laws No. 133, item 883).

ERRORS.minLengthField: Field must be {{required}} characters long, another {{actual}} characters missing

COOPERATIONFORMPAGE.heading: Establish cooperation with us
COOPERATIONFORMPAGE.text: We are looking for partners, with the exception of construction and long-lasting relations, and open to holiday offers. It is also interesting for the organization on the basis of subcontracting.

ABOUT.company: Employment and Employment Agency MEDUM for a young and ambitious company with several years of experience in the Scandinavian labor market. The headquarters of our company is located in Poland. We mainly deal with welding, construction and recruitment services. It implements installers, steel construction fitters, industrial insulators, steelwork sanders and general construction personnel.
ABOUT.subCompany: We focus on the quality and reliability of our employees and services. We know that our strength lies in people, that's why we provide them with the best working conditions.
